name: AstroMouse (LD39)
description:
Space mice design the worst ships. This one has limited battery capacity and must be recharged via running in a wheel! They won't get your money again.

VVVVVControlsVVVVV

Space to open the ship menu.

Select a room with your mouse.

Being in the Wheel generates power.

Being on the Gunnery Deck lets you shoot using the mouse.

Being in the Bridge moves you forward and allows you to control the ship with W and S.

Press Space again to close ship menu

VVVVVCreditsVVVVV

Design > Skullpixel & Clockwise 2000

Art and Code > SkullPixel

Audio > Clockwise 2000

A game designed in 72 hours for LDJAM 39.

LDJAM page -
